text: The first features from our cutest drop yet - Minecraft

text: In Maduro’s capture, Russia sees a great-power rival act with impunity - The Washington Post

text: Nick Reiner to be arraigned on murder charges after his parents were stabbed to death - NBC News

text: Musk’s Grok AI Generated Thousands of Undressed Images Per Hour on X - Bloomberg.com

text: Murphy's buzzer beater waved off, Auburn falls 90-88 to Texas A&M - Auburn Tigers

text: Miami 'confident' DT Moten will play vs. Ole Miss - ESPN
